title: Ranged Modifiers
text:
Aiming Bonus: +1 die if you do not perform an Advance , Melee Attack , or Effigy Recall

Positive Abilities: abilities that add dice to the pool

Firing Into Melee: -1 die for each other model engaging target. Terrain: see Terrain section pg.50

Negative Abilities: abilities that remove dice from the pool
